detection_summary: 10 malicious detections out of 95 total detections, primarily associated with Android APKs.

discovered_relationships.context: This file has been detected by 22 vendors as malicious and is associated with the IOC.
Another APK file with significant detections (9 malicious out of 78 total) indicates possible active threats linked to the IOC.

priority_discoveries.discovery: Malicious APK files linked to high detection rates.
priority_discoveries.significance: These discoveries indicate a potential ongoing threat campaign utilizing site111.mallmaster.top as part of its infrastructure.

recommended_next_steps: Analyze the identified APK files further for behavioral indicators and malicious payloads.
Conduct additional investigation on the detected IPs associated with the domain.
Request assessment from malware analysis specialist on the findings related to these communicating files.
analytical_summary: The analysis of site111.mallmaster.top reveals high association with malicious Android APK files, indicating ongoing cyber threats. Communicating files have high detection counts, warranting further scrutiny and possible involvement of specialized analysts.
